pullRequest.title: Remove direct dependency between ParserContext and MapperService
pullRequest.bodyText:
ParserContext only needs some small portions of MapperService, and certainly does not need to expose MapperService through its current getter method.
With this change we address this by keeping references to the needed components rather than the whole MapperService.

commit.message:
Remove direct dependency between ParserContext and MapperService

ParserContext only needs some small portions of MapperService, and certainly does not need to expose MapperService through its current getter method.

With this change we address this by keeping references to the needed components rather than the whole MapperService

nodes.bodyText: We can probably change this to use the Version directly as a follow-up
